synopsis.p: Writes the corpus data structure in files in tabular format.

description.p: evaluates as a list of elements with the corpus as the context element and creates a file for each result. The file is located in and named after the result of (evaluated as a string).
The file is a table where each line is the result of the evaluation of as a list of element with the file element as the context element. Each line will have as many columns as the size of the array.
Each expression of is evaluated as a string with the line element as the context element.

param-doc.name: columns
param-doc.p: Expressions that specify the contents of each column.

param-doc.name: active
param-doc.p: This expression is evaluated as a boolean with the corpus as the context element, the module will process the document only if the result is true.

param-doc.name: lines
param-doc.p: Expression that specifies which element corresponds to each line.

param-doc.name: files
param-doc.p: Expression that specifies which element corresponds to each file.

param-doc.name: charset
param-doc.p: Character encoding of the written files.

param-doc.name: append
param-doc.p: Either to append the export at the end of a file, if the file exists.

param-doc.name: userFunctions
param-doc.p: Set user functions available for this module. If this module is a sequence, then all compounds inherit its functions.
